create.subject: {ticket} EcoTaxa account modification request.
create.assistance: If you have any question about your data or need additional support,  email {email}
create.body:
Some of the information provided in your profile need to be modified :
{reason}
Please click the following link to modify your registration information: {link}
{assitance}

inform.subject: EcoTaxa account information - Email modified.
